definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: overseas Chinese/persons of Chinese origin having foreign citizenship

sentences.english: Was the first Asian-American to be governor of state in continental U. S.
sentences.chinese: 他是美籍华人在美国大陆的首位州长。

sentences.english: Twenty laundries were burned that night.
sentences.chinese: 当天晚上，华人开设的洗衣店就有二十家被付之一炬。

sentences.english: Criteria of Seawater Quality of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中华人民共和国海水水质标准。

sentences.english: Most Chinese-Americans live in cities on the Pacific and Atlantic coasts.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的美藉华人住在太平洋和大西洋沿岸的城市。

sentences.english: Which is the capital of America A. New York B. Beijing …
sentences.chinese: 北京是中华人民共和国的首都。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Ministry of Communications of the PRC is the institution in charge of the nation-wide highway undertaking.
sentences.chinese: 第三条中华人民共和国交通部主管全国公路事业。

sentences.english: One of its projects is called the MOCA Story Map.
sentences.chinese: 美国华人博物馆有一个叫做故事地图的项目。

sentences.english: The Regulations Concerning the Prevention of Pollution of Sea Areas by Vessels of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中华人民共和国防止船舶污染海域管理条例。

sentences.english: Jazz seems to be a virgin territory in Mandopop.
sentences.chinese: 爵士乐好象在华人嬉哈里还是块处女地。

sentences.english: Party A violates any Law or Regulation of P. R.
sentences.chinese: 甲方违反任何中华人民共和国的法律或法规。

sentences.english: Long live the People's Republic, Long live the great unity of people of the world.
sentences.chinese: 中华人民共和国万岁，世界人民大团结万岁。

sentences.english: A baba is a Peranakan man.
I consider myself to be an American-Born-Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我认为自己是一个美籍华人。

sentences.english: The Economic and Commercial Counsellor's Office of the Embassy of the People's Republ…
sentences.chinese: 中华人民共和国驻南非共和国大使馆经济商务参赞处。

sentences.english: But the proportion of Chinese-Americans who failed to earn a high school diploma is higher than the general population.
sentences.chinese: 而华人未获高中文凭的比例也高于美国的平均水平。

sentences.english: This standard is proposed by National Tourism Administration of the P. R. C.
sentences.chinese: 本标准由中华人民共和国国家旅游局提出。

definition: ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
overseas Chinese/(in a restricted sense) Chinese emigrant who still retains Chinese nationality/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
